description: Moving away from Zone.js completely in favor of Signals for lighter, faster applications.
Hydrating only the parts of the page that are interactive, further reducing initial load times.
Continued emphasis on standalone components and functional APIs to lower the barrier to entry.
They’re designing a way so you don’t always need a selector when creating a component/directive.
New MCP Server tools to improve AI-powered workflow & code generation
New details about the Angular Accessible Rich Internet Applications (ARIA) package (A set of attributes that can be added to HTML elements to increase their accessibility)
Introduction of Signal Forms, a new way to handle forms in Angular using Signals for better reactivity and performance.
